song.title: Come As You Are
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .G C ;Capo 3 [V1] .G C G Come out of sadness, from wherever you've been .C G D Come broken hearted, Let rescue begin || .Em G C G Come find your mercy, Oh sinner come kneel .C G D Em Earth has no sorrow that Heaven can't heal .C G D G Earth has no sorrow that Heaven can't heal
[C] . C G So lay down your burdens, lay down your shame . C D All who are broken, lift up your face || . C Em Oh wanderer come home, you're not too far . C D So lay down your hurt, lay down your heart, . Em Come as you are ---
[V2] .G There's hope for the hopeless . C G and all those who've strayed .C G D G Come sit at the table, Come taste of the grace || . Em G C G There's rest for the weary, rest that endures .C G D G Earth has no sorrow that Heaven can't cure
[B] . C Come as you are . Em Fall in his arms . D Come as you are
[V3] .G C G There's joy for the morning, Oh sinner be still .C G D Em Earth has no sorrow that Heaven can't heal .C G D G Earth has no sorrow that Heaven can't heal
